amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Natural Resources Conservation Service (NRCS) Conservation Operation Account by $5 million offset by a $5 million reduction for Farm Service Agency (FSA) Salaries and Expenses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in part B of House Report 111-191 to increase funding for the Natural Resources Conservation Service (NRCS) Conservation Operation Account by $5,000,000 and offset the increase by decreasing funding for Farm Service Agency (FSA) Salaries and Expenses by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
